## PartialAPIOptions type

Partial options for the Hop client

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type PartialAPIOptions = Partial<Omit<APIClientOptions, 'authentication'>> & Pick<APIClientOptions, 'authentication'>;
```
